parameters.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
p.document_number AS rut_solicitante, 
p.id AS id_solicitante,
p.business_name AS solicitante,
CASE s.owner_type
WHEN "EnterprisePerson" THEN (SELECT ep.document_number FROM cumplo_db_app.enterprise_people AS ep WHERE ep.id = s.owner_id)
WHEN "EnterpriseProfile" THEN (SELECT ep.document_number FROM cumplo_db_app.enterprise_profiles AS ep WHERE ep.id = s.owner_id)
ELSE "N/A" END AS rut_representante,
CASE s.owner_type
WHEN "EnterprisePerson" THEN (SELECT CONCAT(TRIM(ep.names)," ",TRIM(ep.first_surname)," ",TRIM(IFNULL(ep.second_surname,""))) FROM cumplo_db_app.enterprise_people AS ep WHERE ep.id = s.owner_id)
WHEN "EnterpriseProfile" THEN (SELECT ep.business_name FROM cumplo_db_app.enterprise_profiles AS ep WHERE ep.id = s.owner_id)
ELSE "N/A" END AS representante,
c2.name as comuna_empresa,
reg.name region_empresa,
concat(a.street," ", a.number) AS direccion, 
a.apartment AS  depto,
ci.name ciudad,
re.name AS Region,
CASE 
WHEN cs.cve IS NULL THEN cs.notary_name 
ELSE cs.cve
END AS "notaria/CVE",
cs.notary_lawyer_name AS Notario,
c.name AS comuna_notaria,
cs.public_notary_date AS "Fecha Escritura Publica"
FROM
enterprise_profiles as p
LEFT JOIN cumplo_db_app.addresses AS a ON a.addressable_id = p.id AND a.addressable_type = "EnterpriseProfile"
LEFT JOIN communes as c2 ON a.commune_id = c2.id
LEFT JOIN regions as reg ON c2.region_id = reg.id
LEFT JOIN cumplo_db_app.shares AS s ON s.enterprise_profile_id = p.id AND s.is_legal_representative = 1
LEFT JOIN cumplo_db_app.company_secretaries AS cs ON p.id = cs.enterprise_profile_id
LEFT JOIN cumplo_db_app.communes AS c ON cs.commune_id = c.id
LEFT JOIN cumplo_db_app.addresses AS a2 ON c.id = a2.addressable_id
LEFT JOIN cumplo_db_app.cities AS ci ON c.city_id = ci.id
LEFT JOIN cumplo_db_app.regions AS re ON ci.region_id = re.id
where p.document_number = $1
order by 2 desc;
